# UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.inline

**Case**

A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in regular-width environments.

## Declaration

```swift
case inline
```

## Item layout

- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.stacked**: A vertically stacked icon and title.
- **UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.compactInline**: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in compact-width environments.

items.description: A vertically stacked icon and title.
items.name: UITabBarItemAppearance.Style.stacked

items.description: A side-by-side layout of the icon and title, suitable for use in compact-width environments.
